name: The Israelites Dancing around the Golden Calf
description: The Israelites Dancing around the Golden Calf; Sébastien Bourdon (French, 1616 - 1671); France; about 1645; Pen and brown ink, brown and white oil paint; 47.6 x 64.9 cm (18 3/4 x 25 9/16 in.); 88.GG.39; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Israelites Dancing around the Golden Calf
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown and white oil paint
